name: Magno the Robot
description:
This is a story about a little robot named Magno.
Magno can't pick things up because he has no arms.
Magno can't jump because his legs are too weak.
But Magno has the power of magnetism.
Magno can push and pull on any metal in his environment.
With this power, Magno can accomplish anything.
He can even reach...the Great Monolith.

Controls:
-WASD to move.
-Mouse to look around.
-Look at a metal object to make it your target.
-Left click to PUSH target.
-Right click to PULL target.
-ESC. to pause the game.

Tips:
-The platforming can be tricky, but it's all doable.
-Don't just hold push/pull. Pulse the forces. Moderate your velocity.
-Pull a metal platform to center yourself on it.
-The Snake cannot hurt you, but he blocks your path.
-The spike ball must have sufficient velocity to damage the Snake.

Game built in Unity
3D models and animations created in Blender
Textures created in Adobe Photoshop
Music by Bensound.com
Sound Effects by Zapsplat.com
Inspired by the novels of Brandon Sanderson
